title: BRIEF-Schweiter Technologies reports FY 17 total net income of CHF 172 mln
text: March 9, 2018 / 5:18 AM / Updated an hour ago BRIEF-Schweiter Technologies reports FY 17 total net income of CHF 172 mln Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 9 (Reuters) - Schweiter Technologies Ag: * ‍NET REVENUE FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS INCREASED 7% (+6% IN LOCAL CURRENCIES) TO CHF 980.2 MILLION​ FOR 2017 * ‍BOARD OF DIRECTORS WILL PROPOSE A SPECIAL DIVIDEND OF CHF 5 PER SHARE​ * SAYS FY 17 ‍ TOTAL NET INCOME CHF 172 MILLION VERSUS CHF 70.6 MILLION​ * ‍BOARD OF DIRECTORS WILL PROPOSE TRANSFER OF COMPANY’S REGISTERED OFFICE TO STEINHAUSEN​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
